outputs.output_descr: The project supports the riparian countries to sustainably manage land and water resources and address climate changes challenges. The project aims to develop an integrated strategy for water quality and water quantity that is incremental to the current work and to implement demonstration projects that test the multiple environmental benefits of wetlands to mitigate impacts of floods and droughts and help to reduce nutrient pollution.

project_title: Transboundary management for the Tisa River Basin
